Name: Mustakimur Rahman
AboutMe:
Hello, I am Khandaker Mustakimur Rahman, from Bangladesh. I am a software engineer completed my graduation from Chittagong University of Engineering and Technology in Computer Science and Engineering. I am now working in Samsung R&D Institute Bangladesh as android developer.

I love to code, find out solution of any problem, which craze me towards learning different language, and solve lot of problem in online contests. Besides all, I am a techno-mad, always try to adhere me with latest technology.

My favorite programming language is Java. But, I also love C/C++. I am also skilled with PHP, JavaScript, and their different library like CodeIgniter and JQuery. Android is my profession language.

My favorite topics in latest technology are smartphone app, machine learning, and operating system.

My wish one day I may complete my higher graduation from a reputed university and continue to work for my country and pride my nation.
